self.name: stats.getMessagePublicForwards
self.description:
Obtains a list of messages, indicating to which other public channels was a channel message forwarded.
Will return a list of message with peer_id equal to the public channel to which this message was forwarded.
self.descriptionExcerpt: Obtains a list of messages, indicating to which other public channels was a channel message...

arguments.name: offsetRate
arguments.description: Initially 0, then set to the next_rate parameter of messages.messagesSlice

arguments.name: offsetPeer
arguments.description: Offsets for pagination, for more info click here

arguments.name: offsetId
arguments.description: Offsets for pagination, for more info click here

arguments.name: limit
arguments.description: Maximum number of results to return, see pagination

throws.description: The provided message id is invalid
throws.name: MESSAGE_ID_INVALID
